message: I live in Australia and really enjoy the TWIT network. I realise that TWIT is a US based Netcast but it would be great if we could see an international round up of tech news. For example here in Australia there is a huge debate raging about our government rolling out a national fibre network. Maybe invite some guests from these countries to explain to your US audience the tech issues of that country anyway it was just a thought.

@learnscape Greetings from Switzerland! Although not specific to Switzerland, the news today is the Adroid IQon system the SAAB cars from Sweden are planning to put in their cars http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=8BOd9oX1p4s&feature=player_embedded#at=53
